com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core.cvar

Class CVar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core.cvar.CVar
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanCVar, FloatCVar, IntCVar, StringCVar

    public abstract class CVar
extends java.lang.Object
    CVars start with a small letter and are CamelCase.

      • register

        protected void register(java.lang.String name,
                        CVarFlags flag,
                        AbstractCVarSystem parent)
        Registering should only be done by the game or the engine in init phase. Also saves as defaultValue. if already registered updates the default and current value.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the cvar
